question: Which organisation released a report titled ‘The World’s Women 2020: Trends and Statistics’?
explanation:
The United Nations has launched a report titled ‘The World’s Women 2020: Trends and Statistics’. It compiles 100 data stories to assess the state of gender equality worldwide.
As per the report, less than 50% of working-age women are in the labour market. This has been the same since the last quarter of the century. The report also reveals that COVID-19 pandemic additionally affects women’s jobs and livelihoods.
